name: Joust one
description:
This game is a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2019.

The theme was: Only One, so in this game you have:

  • Joust one button
  • Joust one screen
  • And joust one chance to win each round

Defeat all the ghost knights in a joust duel!

 Hold your right mouse button to lower your spear, hit the target on your opponent to win the round !

This game is better in FullScreen

Credits:

Kad'talyc - Programmation

BigBen - Art & Design

Marie Horvat - Art & Design (https://www.linkedin.com/in/marie-horvat-ab0b53178/)

Drunken Choko - Programmation & Integration
